column5: Bounce is loud; bright and beautiful. Bounce embrasses a deep bold colour pallete combining a modern designs; and old designs with a modern twist.
column6: 100% Heat set polypropylene frise; machine made.
column7: No shedding; highly stain resistant; durable; tight weave; soft under foot; rich colour pallete; colour fast; antistatic and easy to clean.
